title: Mir Jan Muhammad Khan Jamali meets Turkish Ambassador
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 25 (APP):In a significant step towards strengthening bilateral relations between Pakistan and T端rkiye, Mir Jan Muhammad Khan Jamali, Honorary Consul General of the Republic of T端rkiye for Quetta, met with H.E. Mr. Irfan Neziroglu, Turkish Ambassador to Pakistan.
The meeting focused on enhancing cooperation in trade, education, and culture, with both dignitaries emphasizing the importance of people-to-people contacts and institutional linkages.
Mir Jan Muhammad Khan Jamali and the Turkish Ambassador explored opportunities for economic cooperation, including trade and investment, and discussed ways to promote cultural exchange programs.
The meeting highlighted the potential for Pakistani businesses to tap into the Turkish market and vice versa, and both sides expressed their commitment to strengthening Pakistan-T端rkiye relations.
This meeting is expected to further strengthen the historic ties between Pakistan and T端rkiye, promoting mutual understanding and cooperation between the two nations.
